import React from 'react'; import './team.scss' function Team() { return (

TEAM

Pawel Osowski Chief Strategy Officer Pawel Osowski Chief Strategy Officer With a Masters degree in law and an MBA from the University of Montreal, Pawel is one of Polands leading business and investment experts, member of numerous boards and panels including the European Commission, PR Boutiques International and arena.pl. He is also Managing Partner of ONEX Capital Limited & Warsaw Consultants.
Daniel Cox Social Media Manager Daniel Cox Social Media Manager Broadcast Journalism student at Salford University in Manchester. Passionate sports writer and storyteller. Technology and social media enthusiast who values all channels of connecting content to avid sports fans & readers.
Richard Piotrowski Chief Digital Officer Richard Piotrowski Chief Digital Officer Honours BBA Graduate from Wilfrid Laurier University and Executive MBA graduate from the Warsaw School of Economics and University of Montreal, currently serving as Managing Partner at GBV360 PRO, an award winning V-Commerce/VR interactive development agency & Investment Director at ONEX Capital Limited. Richard perfectly embodies the horizon driven entrepreneur.
Lindsay Gray Founder & CEO Lindsay Gray Founder & CEO The Founder of STADIUUM Group, embodying an absolute commitment to seeing STADIUUM Group succeed. Lindsay has spent the better part of four years fine-tuning a wide ranging suite of products, the first chapter of which is SocialCast. STADIUUM Group was born out of frustration of a sports media & igaming landscape that was failing on delivering its full potential to its most important aspect the fans.
James Mortimer Chief Marketing & Content Officer James Mortimer Chief Marketing & Content Officer Instrumental in building up the social media and content presence of the All Blacks over eight years, James also launched the digital assets of SANZAAR, who negotiated a $1 billion broadcasting deal in 2015. An award winning storyteller, James has led the marketing and membership efforts for Event Hospitality & Entertainment Ltd, Compass Group and Fitness First.
Peter Kite Chief Legal Officer Peter Kite Chief Legal Officer Legal and Business Affairs Professional with over 20 Years experience in: media, marketing, entertainment, technology and sports business. Peter not only brings an astute legal mind to the Team, but his collective wide ranging experience delivers a well refined and highly unique perspective as well.
Yuriy Tyurin Chief Technology Officer Yuriy Tyurin Chief Technology Officer Software Engineer, Enterprise Architect and highly experienced Team Leader with 15 Years + experience spanning an almost inexhaustible array of technology and data disciplines and fields. Former Network Engineer with the Russian Defence Force. Fluent in three languages, Yuriy exemplifies the consummate global technology professional.
Stuart Thomas National Brand Director (AUS) Stuart Thomas National Brand Director (AUS) Journalist, sports writer, sports lover and sports fan. Stuarts love for sport pulled him away from a teaching career spanning nearly two decades and into the clutches of the Australian sports media landscape. Previously pursued the illustrious career of a professional golfer; Stuart embodies and exceedingly deep understanding of sport from a diverse array of vantage points.
Tim Johnston National Brand Director (UK) Tim Johnston National Brand Director (UK) Over 15 years experience in the telecommunications & technology industries. Tim embodies an intricate, in-depth knowledge of the inner-workings of the Global iGaming industry, with a specialty in the UK and European Market. Tims network salesmanship and passion for sport and betting is warmly received by STADIUUM Group.
Matt Johnson Chief Finance Officer Matt Johnson Chief Finance Officer Experienced CFO & Qualified Accountant with a demonstrated history of delivering value working in the IT and services industry. Skilled in Strategic, operational and financial Planning with successful execution. Matt not only has an iron grasp of most aspects of commercial finance, but a lot of this falls within the media and sport verticals.
Roger Mitchell Chief Investment Officer Roger Mitchell Chief Investment Officer International Bluechip CFO/COO/CEO/CIO. Corporate financier M&A. Change agent. Forensic/commercial due diligence specialist; Led 3 IPOs. Masters in Global Corporate Finance from The Wharton School. Over 35 Years of international, cross-cultural experience. With companies such as: EMI Music, UEFA, Scottish Professional Football League, HSBC Securities, Israeli Professional Football Leagues to name a few.
); } export default Team;
